availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John Roberts, Jr. (Henry County, Kentucky, farmer and accused murderer)

body.p: Henry County, Kentucky, farmer. Son of John B. Roberts and Elizabeth Roberts. Resident in Henry County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Henry County, Kentucky, in 1860. Reported as a fugitive on December 22, 1861.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, District 2, p. 464B-465A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, Subdivision 1, p. 310.
KYR-0001-021-0045.
